# Measure

# Measure

Represents a single measure as part of a musical score in musical notation.

Kind: global class

  • Measure
    • new exports.Measure([maxDuration])
    • .data ⇒ Array
    • .duration ⇒ string
    • .duration
    • .maxDuration ⇒ number
    • .clone() ⇒ Measure
    • .durationLeft([position]) ⇒ number
    • .initNext(position)
    • .validateInsertion(position, duration) ⇒ boolean
    • .addNote(note, [duration], position) ⇒ boolean
    • .addNotes(notes, [duration], position) ⇒ *
    • .addChord(notes, name, duration, position) ⇒ boolean
    • .deleteNote(note, position) ⇒ boolean
    • .deleteNotes(notes, position) ⇒ *
    • .deleteMember(position) ⇒ boolean
    • .transpose(interval) ⇒ Measure
    • .clear() ⇒ boolean
    • .toString() ⇒ string

# new exports.Measure([maxDuration])

Param Type Default Description
[maxDuration] Number 0 Max duration of the measure(decided by time signature)

# measure.data ⇒ Array

Returns the data of the measure - an array of objects where each object has a set of notes and the duration for those notes.

Kind: instance property of Measure

# measure.duration ⇒ string

Returns the duration the measure will use when adding a new member to the data.

Kind: instance property of Measure

# measure.duration

Sets the duration for the measure's next data input.

Kind: instance property of Measure

Param Type
duration string

# measure.maxDuration ⇒ number

Returns the maximum sum of durations for the measure as a number, where each unit is 1/64 bit.

Kind: instance property of Measure

# measure.clone() ⇒ Measure

Returns a deep clone of the measure.

Kind: instance method of Measure

# measure.durationLeft([position]) ⇒ number

Returns the duration left for notes in the measure.

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Default
[position] number this.data.length

# measure.initNext(position)

Creates a slot for the next notes that will be added in the measure if there is space.

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Description
position number Position to initialize the next notes to.

# measure.validateInsertion(position, duration) ⇒ boolean

Checks whether a new data member can be added at a certain position in the measure.

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Description
position number The position to check for.
duration

# measure.addNote(note, [duration], position) ⇒ boolean

Adds a note to the measure at some position.

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Default Description
note string raw note representation.
[duration] string "this.duration"
position number The position in the data to add the note to.

# measure.addNotes(notes, [duration], position) ⇒ *

Adds notes to the note set at the position.

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Default Description
notes Array An array of raw notes.
[duration] string "this.duration"
position number The position in the data to add the notes to.

# measure.addChord(notes, name, duration, position) ⇒ boolean

Adds notes to the measure plus a name that represents the chord and is saved in the data at the position as caption

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param
notes
name
duration
position

Example

measure.addChord({
     notes: ['C3', 'E3', 'G3'],
     name: 'C Major',
     duration: '4n'
     }, 0)      // Adds a C major chord at the start of the measure.

# measure.deleteNote(note, position) ⇒ boolean

Delete note at the position.

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Description
note string raw note.
position number The position in the data to delete the note at.

# measure.deleteNotes(notes, position) ⇒ *

Deletes notes from the noteset at the position.

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Description
notes Array An array of raw notes.
position number The position in the data to delete the notes at.

# measure.deleteMember(position) ⇒ boolean

Delete member from the measure's data - removes all the notes from it and initializes a new data member with the measure's duration.

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Description
position number Position of the member to delete.

# measure.transpose(interval) ⇒ Measure

Returns a new measure where all the notes are transposed by the interval.

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Description
interval number Interval to transpose by.

# measure.clear() ⇒ boolean

Removes all the data from the measure.

Kind: instance method of Measure

# measure.toString() ⇒ string

Returns a simple representation of the measure as a string.

Kind: instance method of Measure
